title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Cub Crafter X Cub - Managing the autopilot
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we to use the autopilot in a Cub Crafter X Cub.

We will depart from Luxemburg Airport Runway 24 fly to west and after that to the south. After showing some of the options of the autopilot we will return to the airport and will try to use the approach mode from the autopilot.

In this video the following addons are used:

Luxembourg city:
https://flightsim.to/file/18226/luxembourg-city

Luxembourg airport:
https://flightsim.to/file/12973/luxemburg-airport
